values.description:
By default it installed to `/usr/share/share/vrc_arenas`
I just removed the extra "share" dir in the install prefix so it installs to `/usr/share/vrc_arenas`
values.title: install prefix

summary.raw:
By default it installed to `/usr/share/share/vrc_arenas`
I just removed the extra "share" dir in the install prefix so it installs to `/usr/share/vrc_arenas`

values.title: Remove extra share from install path

summary.html:
This pull request makes the following changes to all the CMakeLists.txt to avoid creating a share directory wherever it is installed.

${CMAKE_INSTALL_PATH}/share/${PROJECT_NAME} -> ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PATH}/${PROJECT_NAME}

Check to make sure I'm not missing a path that still refers to the extra share directory.

values.description:
Initial support for testing suite. Variable ```LIGHT_TEST_SUITE``` can be used for running only the first scenario (vrc_finals/task1, vrc_finals/task6, vrc_finals/task11)  of each kind of worlds (vrc1, vrc2, vrc3).

Import rosapi support from drcsim and use the tools from there.
values.title: Initial support for testing. rosapi checks

summary.raw:

Import rosapi support from drcsim and use the tools from there.

values.description:
Sorry to point to "non default branch" but it's easy for quick review and quite fast for me to merge. I will change the target to default when approved pull request #6 (should be done first).

Implements the gzlog stop checks available in drcsim and include a 30min rounds of testing for all worlds in the full version of the test suite.

values.description:
I'm getting errors for mud when launching VRC type 2 worlds. 

@nkoenig I believe that we have change the URI in vrc_task_2 for atlas_utils. The patch is just based on changes in drscim, so please give it an extra look.

values.description:
Don't panic, too many files but most the same.

Implementation of frequency checkers from drcsim to vrc_arenas worlds.

Introduce three modes of running the test suite:

* Light: one test of each world (1,6 and 11). Does not contain long tests. Designed to run with every arenas or drcsim change.
* Heavy: Contain some of the long tests and all of the light.
* Paranoid: all tests in all worlds.
values.title: Publishers frequency tests files

summary.raw:
Don't panic, too many files but most the same.

Implementation of frequency checkers from drcsim to vrc_arenas worlds.

Introduce three modes of running the test suite:

* Light: one test of each world (1,6 and 11). Does not contain long tests. Designed to run with every arenas or drcsim change.
* Heavy: Contain some of the long tests and all of the light.
* Paranoid: all tests in all worlds.
summary.html:
Don't panic, too many files but most the same.

Implementation of frequency checkers from drcsim to vrc_arenas worlds.

Introduce three modes of running the test suite:

  • Light: one test of each world (1,6 and 11). Does not contain long tests. Designed to run with every arenas or drcsim change.
  • Heavy: Contain some of the long tests and all of the light.
  • Paranoid: all tests in all worlds.

values.description: Per John's email, we don't need this info for debugging any more.  Removing it reduces log file size, which decreases upload time and may avoid portal errors.

values.description:
With drcsim branch drcsim_2.6 and vrc_arenas default checked out, I use the following script to compare the firehose models:
~~~
for i in `echo _a _b _c`
do
    SRC=vrc_firehose_long
    NEW="$SRC$i"
    cat vrc_arenas/models/$NEW/model.sdf | sed -e "s@$NEW@$SRC@" | diff drcsim/gazebo_models/environments/$SRC/model.sdf -
    cat vrc_arenas/models/$NEW/materials/scripts/$NEW.material | sed -e "s@$NEW@$SRC@" | diff drcsim/gazebo_models/environments/$SRC/materials/scripts/$SRC.material -
    echo 'Hit Ctrl+D to proceed'
    wc
done
~~~
values.title: Set firehose friction to 1.0, update coupling inertial pose, and mesh for attachment_vis

summary.raw:
With drcsim branch drcsim_2.6 and vrc_arenas default checked out, I use the following script to compare the firehose models:
~~~
for i in `echo _a _b _c`
do
    SRC=vrc_firehose_long
    NEW="$SRC$i"
    cat vrc_arenas/models/$NEW/model.sdf | sed -e "s@$NEW@$SRC@" | diff drcsim/gazebo_models/environments/$SRC/model.sdf -
    cat vrc_arenas/models/$NEW/materials/scripts/$NEW.material | sed -e "s@$NEW@$SRC@" | diff drcsim/gazebo_models/environments/$SRC/materials/scripts/$SRC.material -
    echo 'Hit Ctrl+D to proceed'
    wc
done
~~~
summary.html:
With drcsim branch drcsim_2.6 and vrc_arenas default checked out, I use the following script to compare the firehose models:

for i in `echo _a _b _c`
do
    SRC=vrc_firehose_long
    NEW="$SRC$i"
    cat vrc_arenas/models/$NEW/model.sdf | sed -e "s@$NEW@$SRC@" | diff drcsim/gazebo_models/environments/$SRC/model.sdf -
    cat vrc_arenas/models/$NEW/materials/scripts/$NEW.material | sed -e "s@$NEW@$SRC@" | diff drcsim/gazebo_models/environments/$SRC/materials/scripts/$SRC.material -
    echo 'Hit Ctrl+D to proceed'
    wc
done
